name: My Ex-Boyfriend Turned Into A Vampire?!
name_original: My Ex-Boyfriend Turned Into A Vampire?!
description:
YAOI JAM 2022 :D: My Ex-Boyfriend Turned Into A Vampire?!

SUMMARY: Eli’s broken up with his long-time boyfriend and is finally set on moving on. But what happens when said ex shows up on his doorstep with red eyes and fangs — and is covered in blood?

Despite their rocky breakup, Yarrow has come to Eli for help with this perplexing transformation. He’s turned into a vampire and needs his ex’s help to adjust to a lifestyle he knows nothing about.

“My Ex-Boyfriend Turned Into A Vampire!” is exactly what its title entails: a light-hearted visual novel with a simple premise, focused on the relationship between a jilted protagonist and his naïve but earnest ex-lover, peppered with philosophical debates about humanity’s darkness and Vampire Knight bashing. 

Will Eli refuse to help his first love, or will that love be rekindled — and with it, a new bloodlust?

Demo written for Yaoijam 2022! The VN itself is NOT NSFW and most of the blood cgs are censored, but it has gorey/mature elements and innuendos, so recommended for 16+ only.

TRIGGER WARNINGS: blood, depictions of gore, mentions of parent death, implied NSFW jokes not included in demo but later on: murder, yandereism, and unhealthy relationships in some routes

Though this VN is about vampires, it mostly focuses on slice of life and the relationship between two exes. Vampires are just the accompaniment!

Demo is not reflective of final product.

Demo includes:Final Product will include: -Cute sprites by Fiftyway
